places_with_reviews.name: HOLY REDEEMER Church

reviews.text:
Most Holy Redeemer Church is a historic Roman Catholic Church situated in the locality of Belthangady. It is one of the oldest Churches in the region and has a rich history of over 136 years.

This Church is the spiritual home to over 610 families with a population of over 2800 members. The Church has started several institutions of which the Holy Redeemer English Medium School, Church Higher Primary School – Kannada Medium and the Holy Redeemer Auditorium are noteworthy.
Holy place. Nice structure,  silent .calm atmosphere.
Religious place, away from city noise, peaceful environment

A very peaceful place for prayer & worship. It is built on a higher ground which makes it a nice place for an evening walk to watch a beautiful sunset and feel the cool breeze.
Very impressive architecture. There is a beautiful heavenly painting on the alter. It is also very spacious inside and can accommodate large number of people.
So calm and good place

places_with_reviews.name: Sri Venkataramana Temple
places_with_reviews.address: X7VQ+9M6, Old Bridge Rd Laila, Belthangady, Karnataka 574214, India

reviews.text: Beautiful GSB temple😌❤️

Belthangady Sri Venkatramana temple is managed by local Gowda Saraswath Brahmin community who are settled here since ages.Though the population of the GSB Community is less the way it is being managed is really astonishing.Temple is maintained so clean and the sanctum Santorum of the Presiding deity and Upa devathas  so beautifully decorated with fragrant flowers is a divine treat for the  indriyas. The natural fragrance of the flowers,Tulsi,sandal paste and other incense sticks take your mind to an higher divine platform.Recently the local public have been conducting Bhajana Sapthanu Sapthaha i.e 49 days 24 hours non stop Bhajan singing by GSB Bhajan groups and individuals which is an Himalayan task which was made possible with the divine grace of Lord Shri Venkatramana the presiding deity of Belthangady and the divine blessings of  H H Shrimadh Samyamindra Theertha Swamiji of Sri Kashi math sansthan and definitely by the cooperative spirit of the Local as well as surrounding GSB samaj members.May the Lord provide all the treasure and pleasure of life to each family at Belthangady for their nishkalankha  aathmartha seva.
Best Place...Beautiful Temple
Nice GSB Temple on NH73, Layila Junction Belthangadi.

Such a Divine Temple
Worth the go
The drive is also very smooth and Beautiful

places_with_reviews.name: St. Lawrence Syro Malabar Catholic Cathedral

reviews.text: Calm and quiet place. Good parking space available.
Heavenly place.. today we are celebrating 25th year silver jubilee

This cathedral is near by belthangady town,  the mass is in Malayalam, next to the cathedral is the Bishops House, the cathedral is very simple but the place is very spiritual, nice environment & surrounding behind the cathedral is the nethravathy river
If you want some peace of mind then you must visit this place.. its silent and you will feel like praying there sitting for an hour 🙏

It's my own church and I can say you that the people who comes to the church for blessing will not go with free hands they will be blessed with all kindness of God Jesus christ. The Bishop house is @ the same place near st Lawrence cathedral church.
